name: EventFactory
desc: On-chain registry of events. Each registered event gets a box keyed by its index.

methods.name: register_event
methods.desc: Register a new TicketManager event contract. Returns the event index.

methods.name: get_event_count
methods.desc: Returns the total number of registered events.

methods.name: get_event
methods.desc: Returns the event entry at the given index.
